alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 9:19AM CST until March 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro .Minor flooding continues on the Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. Water levels continue to fall, and the river will fall below flood stage late tonight. For the Big Muddy River...including Murphysboro...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Some minor flooding in S 3rd & Division / Plum Street area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 15.6 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
